name: add32i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, c1))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, c1)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))

-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, c1)))

comment: Commutative/associative law that swaps the last two terms in a triple sum. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.)
